discordauth-desc: Allows login and registration via Discord with server and role verification.
discordauth-error-invalid-state: Invalid session state. Please try again.
discordauth-error-not-member: You are not a member of the required Discord server.
discordauth-error-no-role: You do not have the required role on the Discord server.
discordauth-error-no-account: No wiki account exists for this Discord account and auto-creation is disabled.
